name: finclip-agent-starterkit
description: Starter kit for building knowledge base-powered agents with finclip-agent

scripts.kb:build: if [ "$IN_DOCKER" = "true" ]; then kb-build --config kb.yml --input contents; else .venv/bin/kb-build --config kb.yml --input contents; fi
scripts.kb:build:debug: if [ "$IN_DOCKER" = "true" ]; then kb-build --config kb.yml --input contents --debug; else .venv/bin/kb-build --config kb.yml --input contents --debug; fi
scripts.kb:search: if [ "$IN_DOCKER" = "true" ]; then kb-search kb.tar.gz; else .venv/bin/kb-search kb.tar.gz; fi
scripts.kb:search:graph: if [ "$IN_DOCKER" = "true" ]; then kb-search --config kb.yml --graph; else .venv/bin/kb-search --config kb.yml --graph; fi
scripts.kb:package: if [ "$IN_DOCKER" = "true" ]; then kb-build --config kb.yml --input contents --export kb.tar.gz; else .venv/bin/kb-build --config kb.yml --input contents --export kb.tar.gz; fi
